Batch fetching workflows

Source: vignettes/batch-workflows.Rmd
batch-workflows.Rmd
library(mongolstats)
library(dplyr)

Create a batch request tibble 

reqs <- tibble::tibble(
  tbl_id = c("DT_NSO_0300_062V1", "DT_NSO_0300_004V5"),
  period = "2016",
  code   = c("12", "181"),
  code1  = c("101", "11")
)
reqs

Fetch multiple tables at once 

pkg <- nso_package(reqs, labels = "en")
# Be robust to empty or differently-shaped results in CI/site builds
pkg %>% dplyr::select(dplyr::any_of(c("tbl_id", "period", "value"))) %>% dplyr::slice_head(n = 10)

Combine with discovery utilities 

itms <- nso_tables()
target <- itms %>% filter(stringr::str_detect(stringr::str_to_lower(tbl_eng_nm), "population")) %>% slice_head(n = 5)
target %>% select(tbl_id, tbl_eng_nm)
